title: Map of Climate Regions of Africa - connection

content.question: Which of the following statements accurately describes a connection between the geography of Africa and the development of early societies on the continent?

choices.label: The accessibility of seas and oceans supported the development of early societies.
A lack of large river systems limited development on the coast.
Vast and unpassable deserts delayed the development of complex societies.
Large tropical rainforests encouraged the early domestication of animals.

content.answer: The accessibility of seas and oceans supported the development of early societies.
